summary: Allows tempering of 2 weapons and a surprise
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Smithing Enhanced[/size]

[line]
[size=4]Tempering[/size]
[size=3]
The Ebony Blade can now be sharpened at a grondstone

Wuuthrad can now be sharpened at a grondstone[/size]

[size=3]Both require an ebony ingot[/size]

[size=4]Surprise[/size]

[size=3]No imperial steel in the steel category for smithing[/size][/center]
[center][line][/center]
[center][size=5]Check out my other modsÂ [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7719935/?tb=mods&pUp=1][size=5]here[/size][/url][/center]
author: SkyrimGamer124
